name: Art of Cubes
description:
People disappeared, leaving behind the greatest invention - intelligent androids.

You have to take on the role of one of the androids, who plows space in search of fragments of human paintings scattered throughout the universe.

Solve challenging but addictive puzzles, collect whole paintings from the pieces you find and restore the legacy of mankind!

Features of the game Art of Cubes:

* Unique game setting. A universe in which androids travel through space after the death of mankind.

* Unique game mechanics, which has no analogues.

* Dozens of playable characters with different abilities

* Dozens of game zones with unique mechanics

* Hundreds of recreated masterpieces

This game is part of the Totem network of games. Use your unique Totem Avatars in the game for exclusive features.

Don't have an Avatar yet? Get one for free through the Totem Explorer website!
